text.section:
This section does not apply to a person giving away an animal:
as an agricultural project;
for conservation purposes; or
that is intended for slaughter.

Without the approval of the Secretary of Agriculture, a person may not give away a live animal as:
a prize for, or inducement to enter, a contest, game, or other competition;
an inducement to enter a place of amusement; or
an incentive to make a business agreement if the offer is to attract trade.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $500.
